name: No Heroes Allowed!
description:
Become the ultimate "God of Destruction"! Now with 10 different "powered" Pick-Axes, you'll fend off over 100 different invading hero types. Choose your strategy wisely as you spend your "dig power" breaking up blocks containing nutrients or "mana" to create over 200 monster types to thwart your enemies advance. Use the new WATER element offense and defense tactics by creating pools and by spawning aquatic creatures. Study the underworld food chain and choose the monsters carefully in order to create a self-sustaining ecosystem of creatures to protect Overlord Badman's evil lair!

Download No Heroes Allowed!™ today!

Key Features:

•3 Difficulty modes - the most accessible and easy to play game in the series

•Battle through 33 stages in the hilarious Story Mode

•First Co-Op mode in the series! Join a friend to build the ultimate dungeon

•Dungeon-A-Day mode -100 daily missions to build and track your skills

 •"Badman's Chamber" feature - test different hero types against your dungeon
